name: Bloktopia
description: Bloktopia is a Skyscraper made up of 21 levels to pay recognition to 21 million Bitcoin. Token holders will be known as Bloktopians. It will act as a central hub and welcome all levels of crypto experience. For the first time ever, users will have access to crypto information and immersive content all in one place. Bloktopians will be able to earn revenue through real estate ownership, advertising revenue, play games, build networks and much more. By using the worldâ€™s most advanced real time 3D Creation Engine, Bloktopia will leverage this technology to create stunning visualisations and user experience.
